Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; from top, part of net pattern decoration in added white; two faded white bands and a red band; pomegranate rosette with red centres and red and white circles; trace of two white bands above a red band; exterior: painted decoration consisting of hindquarters of mammal to right with red stripes on top of rump and large red patch on flank.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 259, no. 501, pl. 66)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0493) (phase 2)
